links.title: U.S. Treasury's Mnuchin considering trip to China to talk trade
links.description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said on Saturday he is considering a trip to China to work on trade issues and has discussed the potential for market openings in China with Beijing's new central bank chief.

links.description: IBM is trading 7% lower on Wednesday morning, after beating Wall Street consensus for earnings and revenue but missing on guidance. Can it go lower? links.title: Earnings Roundup: S&P 500 Companies Clear a High Bar | Lipper Alpha Insight | Thomson Reuters
links.description: The first quarter of 2018 is one of the most heavily anticipated earnings seasons, due to high expectations for YoY earnings growth (20.0%).
